answerText: Portnoy's Complaint[10] Portnoy's Complaint is by this American novelist. His novels about Nathan Zuckerman include American Pastoral and The Human Stain.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 6 | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In an infamous scene from this novel, the title character masturbates using a piece of liver, which his mother Sophie then serves for dinner. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel whose title character tells the psychoanalyst Dr. Spielvogel about his sexual liaisons with women like Mary Jane Reed, who he nicknames "The Monkey."
